thread.title: German Finance Minister Pans Protectionist Push

author: Tom Fairless
title: German Finance Minister Pans Protectionist Push
text:
WASHINGTON—Germany’s new finance minister, Olaf Scholz, criticized a return toward protectionism and nationalism during a visit to the U.S. capital, as European Union leaders take steps to avoid trade tariffs announced by the Trump administration.
Mr. Scholz, a Social Democrat who took up his position in Chancellor Angela Merkel’s new coalition government last month, also indicated that Germany will continue the balanced-budget policies that have been criticized for helping to fuel the nation’s giant external surpluses.
...
